channel.title: 资源 on Esoye
channel.description: Recent content in 资源 on Esoye

item.title: 数据库文章资源汇总
item.description: 爬虫 # import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup prefix = 'http://mysql.taobao.org' # 获取文章名和url（文章名,url） def query_name_url(url: str): resp = requests.get(url) soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.content.decode('utf-8'), "html.parser") tags = soup.findAll('a', {'target': {'_blank'}}) urls = [v for v in tags if v['href'].find('/monthly/') != -1] return [(str(v.string).strip(), prefix + v['href']) for v in urls] # 获取所有月报链接（月报名,url） def query_monthly_url(): resp = requests.get('http://mysql.taobao.org/monthly/') soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.content.decode('utf-8'), "html.parser") tags = soup.findAll('a', {'class': {'main'}}) urls = [v for v in tags if v['href'].
